ses:recorderSession.ses:description: Click action links that forward to tiles definitions from a local tiles-defs.xml file.

ses:header.ses:name: accept
ses:header.ses:value: image/gif, image/x-xbitmap, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, application/x-shockwave-flash, */*

ses:header.ses:value: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322)

ses:response.ses:responseBody:
